channel.title: Excel on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in Excel on Some Title

item.title: Call Excel VBA macro from Python using xlwings
item.description: As a practical use of xlwings UDF, I will explain how to call Excel VBA macro from Python. For those who wonder "what is xlwings?", I have posted the following from installation of Python to basic usage of xlwings UDF, so please see that. Introduction to Python for VBA users -Calling Python from Excel with xlwings- 1. Background Even if we started to make in-house EUC tools in Python aiming to get rid of Excel VBA, I think that there are a ton of Excel VBA tools made by our predecessors in-house, and that we also have to use them.
